Title: HP 14 Laptop, Intel Celeron N4020, 4 GB RAM, 64 GB Storage, 14-inch Micro-edge HD Display, Windows 11 Home, Thin & Portable, 4K Graphics, One Year of Microsoft 365 (14-dq0040nr, Snowflake White)
Description: The Snowflake White HP 14 Laptop is designed to keep you productive and entertained from anywhere. Maximize your viewing area and see every detail thanks to 6.5 mm micro-edge bezel display, 79% screen-to-body ratio, and 14-inch HD display. Performance, power consumption, and value come together in the Intel® Celeron® N4020. Enjoy the highest resolution games and movies with Intel® UHD Graphics 600. Store more of what you love with 64 GB of eMMC storage and 4 GB of RAM. Up to 11 hours and 30 minutes of battery life and HP Fast Charge. Includes 1-year subscription to Microsoft 365.

reviews.title: Great value for the price
reviews.comment: I bought this for my daughter’s online classes. It runs smoothly, the battery lasts all day, and the display is clear.

reviews.title: Decent but limited storage
reviews.comment: Performance is okay for web browsing and documents, but the 64 GB storage fills up quickly. Consider adding an SD card.

Title: Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch, Apple M1 Chip with 8‑Core CPU and 8‑Core GPU, 256GB SSD Storage, Space Gray
Description: Apple MacBook Pro 13‑inch with the Apple M1 chip delivers up to 2.8x faster CPU performance, up to 5x faster graphics, and up to 20 hours of battery life. It features a Retina display with True Tone, Magic Keyboard, Touch Bar, and Touch ID.

reviews.title: Blazing fast performance
reviews.comment: The M1 chip is incredibly fast. Apps launch instantly and battery life is amazing. Perfect for development work.

reviews.title: Sleek design, but limited ports
reviews.comment: Love the speed and display quality. Wish it had more than two USB-C ports, though.
